entry.title: As Hunger Spreads in Afghanistan, Hospitals Fill With Premature, Dying Babies
entry.content: Half of the country’s population faces acute hunger, according to the United Nations, with one million children in danger of dying from malnutrition, following an economic collapse under Taliban rule and Western sanctions.

entry.title: IMF Says China's Economic Imbalances Have Worsened
entry.content: Chinese growth in 2022 now forecast at 4.8%, down from the International Monetary Fund’s prior outlook of 5.7%.
